sentences: Kineetiline energia on keha liikumisest tulenev võime tööd teha.
Töötame väsimatu energiaga ja meil on palju loomingulisust.
Puhkame selleks, et koguda energiat järgmiseks päevaks.
context: In Estonian, 'energia' is a noun that refers to energy in both the physical sense (the capacity to do work) and in the psychological sense (enthusiasm, vitality, drive). It's used to describe everything from kinetic energy and electrical power to personal motivation and activity level. The word comes from Latin and Ancient Greek roots related to activity and operation.
